name: cardinal

cardinal noun [C]
(PRIEST)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a priest of very high rank in the Roman Catholic Church: Cardinals elect and advise the Pope.

cardinal noun [C]
(NUMBER)
(also cardinal number) a number that represents amount, such as 1, 2, 3, rather than order, such as 1st, 2nd, 3rd Compare
ordinal
